items.name: Cooking Class
items.description: Take a cooking class together to learn new recipes and techniques. Many classes offer wine pairings and a romantic dinner with your creations afterward.
items.notes: We took an Italian cooking class and had so much fun! The chef was entertaining and we learned to make fresh pasta. Highly recommend for a fun date night.

items.name: Hot Air Balloon Ride
items.description: Experience the thrill of floating above the landscape in a hot air balloon. Many companies offer sunrise flights with champagne.
items.notes: Amazing experience but a bit pricey. The views were incredible and it was very romantic. Early morning wake-up was tough but worth it.

items.name: Stargazing Picnic
items.description: Pack a picnic dinner, blankets, and a telescope or binoculars for a romantic evening under the stars. Find a spot away from city lights for the best viewing.
